title: Teams worth rooting for
itunes:title: Teams worth rooting for
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Chris Wesseling, Marc Sessler and Colleen Wolfe break down the latest news from the NFL, including the latest on the Colin Kaepernick trade situation and Roger Goodell’s comments on the playoffs potentially expanding. Then, the heroes offer up teams you should root for before ending the show discussing the NCAA Men's Division I Basketball Championship game.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
